tool_description: list of all remote jobs from remoteok.com web-site - not official!
name: Jobs from remoteok
title: Jobs from remoteok

api_list.name: Get list
api_list.description: Will show you all job posts. Also you can filter it by adding in the end of endpoint ?tags=digital+nomad
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://jobs-from-remoteok.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jobs-from-remoteok.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://jobs-from-remoteok.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jobs-from-remoteok.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
